g.text: Sometimes it’s hard to appreciate the things you have in this life. Life gets so busy that I find myself taking things for granted. I just wanted to write down a few things so that I’ll always remember the important things.My mom. She is the center of my life. I don’t know what kind of person I would be if she didn’t commit her life to making mine better. She never asks for anything in return for what she does. I hope she knows just how much more vibrant this life is because I have her as my mom.I can only imagine how difficult it must have been raising me without my Dad. Sometimes I feel sad that he’s not in my life anymore, but then I remember how happy he must have made you when he was around. They taught me that even after someone is gone, they are still able to fill your life with joy, because that person will still always love you.
